MainRules: Guaranteed A-Rank or above Construct every 10 attempts
Guaranteed S-Rank Construct every 60 attempts
BaseRules: Random A-Rank or above character is guaranteed every 10 research attempts in Basic Mode.

In Target Mode where you can select a character, an A-Rank or above character is guaranteed every 10 research attempts. You will have a higer chance of getting the selected A-Rank character if you get an A-Rank character.
Please check the relevant announcements for the implementation schedule of new A-Rank characters into Targeted Mode.

In the targeted character pool, the guarantee value of A-Rank and S-Rank characters will not be affected when you change your selected character, which means the guarantee progress is inherited even if you changed the selector before you trigger the guarantee.
DrawBottomHint: [Calibration] The next A-Rank Construct pulled is guaranteed to be your selected target.

MainRules: Guaranteed 5★ or above Weapon for every 10 attempts.
Guaranteed 6★ Weapon every 30 attempts
BaseRules: Guaranteed to receive 5★ or above Weapon for every 10 research attempts.
Guaranteed to receive 6★ Weapon for every 30 research attempts.

MainRules: Choose any set (80% chance to receive the chosen 6★ Weapon when getting a 6★ Weapon)
Guaranteed 5★ or above Weapon for every 10 attempts.
Guaranteed 6★ Weapon every 30 attempts
BaseRules: Choose a Weapon Set for your research. The chosen set will get an increased chance to receive.
In Target Mode, the chance of chosen Weapon set will increase greatly.
DrawBottomHint: [Calibration] The next 6★ weapon pulled is guaranteed to be your selected target.

MainRules: Guaranteed Coating Blueprint Sketch every 10 attempts.
BaseRules: May drop Decor, Blueprints, Coating Sketches, and Residence Permits.
New Decors are not added to the pool yet.

MainRules: 100% to receive 5★ or above Weapon for every 10 research attempts.
100% to receive 6★ or above Weapon for every 30 research attempts.
BaseRules: 100% to receive 5★ or above Weapon for every 10 research attempts.
100% to receive 6★ or above Weapon for every 30 research attempts.
EventRules: If a 6★ Weapon is researched, it has an 80% chance to be the rate-up weapon.
DrawBottomHint: [Calibration] The next 6★ weapon pulled is guaranteed to be your selected target.

MainRules: Guaranteed A-Rank or above Construct every 10 attempts
Guaranteed S-Rank Construct every 60 attempts
BaseRules: Guaranteed to receive A-Rank or above Construct for every 10 research attempts.
Guaranteed to receive S-Rank Construct for every 60 research attempts.
The guarantee is inherited between the same type of pools. For example, after an [Arrival Construct Pool] has ended, its guarantee progress will be inherited by the next [Arrival Construct Pool].
EventRules: When an S-Rank character is researched, 100% chance to receive the rate-up character.
DrawBottomHint: [Calibration] The next S-Rank Construct pulled is guaranteed to be your selected target.

MainRules: Guaranteed A-Rank or above Construct every 10 attempts
Guaranteed S-Rank Construct every 60 attempts
BaseRules: In Targeted Mode where you can select a character, an S-Rank character is guaranteed in every 60 research attempts. You will have a better chance of getting the selected S-Rank character when you get an S-Rank character.

The guarantee value is inherited between the same type of pools and is applied in the Calibration System. For example, after an [Arrival Construct Pool] has ended, its guarantee progress will be inherited by the next [Arrival Construct Pool].
The Calibration System will be activated when the newly-pulled character is not your targeted one. The next S-Rank pulled is guaranteed to be your target.
EventRules: When an S-Rank character is researched, 70% chance to receive the rate-up character.
DrawBottomHint: [Calibration] The next S-Rank Construct pulled is guaranteed to be your selected target.

MainRules: 1. Guaranteed A-Rank or above Construct every 10 attempts
2. Guaranteed S-Rank Construct every 80-100 attempts
3. The overall chance is the same as the Arrival Construct Pool
4. The S-Rank base chance increased
BaseRules: A value will be generated randomly between 80 and 100. For example, if the value is 90, an S-Rank Construct is guaranteed within 90 research attempts. The random guarantee value will be generated again once an S Construct has arrived.
S-Rank Construct base chance: 1.5%. In Target Mode where you can select a character, you will have a better chance of getting the selected S-Rank character when you get an S-Rank character.
S-Rank Construct overall chance: 1.9%. And it is the same as other Construct Research Pools.

The guarantee value is inherited between the same type of pools and is applied in the Calibration System. For example, after an [Arrival Construct Pool] has ended, its guarantee progress will be inherited by the next [Arrival Construct Pool].
The Calibration System will be activated when the newly-pulled character is not your targeted one. The next S-Rank pulled is guaranteed to be your target.
EventRules: When an S-Rank character is researched, 70% chance to receive the rate-up character.
DrawBottomHint: [Calibration] The next S-Rank Construct pulled is guaranteed to be your selected target.

MainRules: Guaranteed S-Rank or above Transcendant every 10 attempts
BaseRules: If you get a Transcendant that you already own, they will be converted into 18 Shards of this character.
Base chance of getting S-Rank Transcendant: 5%
Combined chance of getting S-Rank Transcendant: 12.45%

The guarantee is inherited between the same type of pools. For example, after an [Arrival Event Character Pool] has ended, its guarantee progress will be inherited by the next [Arrival Event Character Pool].

MainRules: Choose any rate-up set. 80% rate in 6★ pool.

BaseRules: Choose 1 gear set to draw. Certain sets have a chance to rate-up.

MainRules: Guaranteed A-Rank or above CUB every 10 attempts
Guaranteed S-Rank or above CUB every 20 attempts
BaseRules: Select 1 CUB to pull. Selected target gains increased chances.
Select a CUB in Target Mode for greatly increased chances.
In the CUB Target Pool, the guaranteed attempt of pulling A-Rank and S-Rank CUBs will not be affected when you change your targeted CUB, which means the guarantee progress is inherited.

MainRules: Guaranteed an A-Rank or above Construct every 10 attempts
Guaranteed an S-Rank or above Construct every 60 attempts
BaseRules: Guaranteed to receive an A-Rank or above Construct for every 10 research attempts.
Guaranteed to receive an S-Rank Construct for every 60 research attempts.
The guarantee progress is inherited between the same type of pools. For example, after the [Wishing Target] pool has ended, its guarantee progress will be inherited by the next [Wishing Target] pool.
EventRules: When an S-Rank Construct is researched, there is a 100% chance to receive the rate-up character.
